bug.author: jiata
bug.summary: [BUG] image transformations are not applied correctly
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Bug with train/test split, looks like right now neither training nor testing gets horizontally flipped (better than both getting flipped) "had a look at how many transformations there are in the train and test set. Both only contained a single transformation, but the training set should be two" <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
